The claim originated from a meme shared: 2. The meme included a quote attributed to Trudeau, stating that seniors over 85 would no longer be allowed to vote due to their views on climate change.
The source of the claim was a now: deleted article from the Cultural Action Party of Canada, a website that has been debunked in the past.
The quote attributed to Trudeau was actu: a New Brunswick-based satirical website. The author of the article confirmed that it was entirely made-up and meant to be satirical.
